name: argmate
author: Mathias Wulff
description: Fast CLI parameter parsing. Zero dependencies. Good DX. Pre-compile for turbo speed.

scripts.build: bun build --target bun src/argMate.ts src/argMateMini.ts src/argEngine.ts src/argEngineMini.ts --outdir dist/ --minify
scripts.test: yarn test-only && yarn build && yarn test-bundle
scripts.test-ci: yarn test-format && yarn lint && yarn test && yarn test-cov
scripts.test-perf-cli: yarn test && cd bench/ && sh test-cli.sh
scripts.test-perf-js: yarn test && cd bench/ && sh test-js.sh
scripts.postrelease: npm publish && git push && git push --tags && echo "Successfully released version $npm_package_version"
